IMesh

IMesh is simply a collection of submesh objects (ISubMesh).

NOTE: This mesh is different from a renderable mesh. There is a function MeshToD3D which will convert the mesh into a renderable mesh.

Functions

virtual bool RayIntersect(
Ray3& 
ray,
RayIntersect3* 
pIntersection,
uint32_t* 
pMaterialID
) = 0

Computes the intersection of a ray with a mesh

Parameters
ray
Ray3&

ray direction to trace

pIntersection
RayIntersect3*

returns the intersection point if a ray intersect occurs

pMaterialID
uint32_t*

returns the material for the part of the mesh interested

Converts a CMesh object into a renderable form

Parameters
